alert.note: Alert for Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties; Lewiston Area (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 3:50PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Nez Perce and northwestern Lewis Counties through 315 PM PDT... At 250 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Culdesac, or 7 miles east of Lapwai, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Culdesac and Gifford. This includes U.S. Highway 95 in Idaho between mile markers 282 and 297. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties; Lewiston Area
